elements: Big bold title 'Niamh & Khalev's Pool Party!' using Fredoka font
Floating 3D-style elements (beach balls, donuts) using Framer Motion

MessengerButton.styling: bg-[#0084FF] text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-full font-bold text-xl shadow-xl hover:shadow-2xl transition-all flex items-center gap-2 mx-auto mt-8

assets.icons: Use Lucide-React: Sun, MapPin, Music, Volume2, VolumeX, MessageCircle, Waves

layout_rules.grid_system: Use a loose, organic layout. Avoid rigid grids. Allow elements to overlap slightly.
layout_rules.spacing: Generous padding (p-8 to p-24). Let the water background breathe.
layout_rules.mobile: Stack cards vertically with generous gap-12. Ensure touch targets are large (min 44px).

rules: All main cards must float gently (y: [0, -10, 0])
Water background should have a slow parallax or ripple effect
Entrance animations: Staggered fade-in-up for text and cards

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion lucide-react react-use`
2. Create a `Layout.js` that handles the water background and music player globally.
3. Use `Fredoka` from Google Fonts (import in index.css).
4. Implement the 'Water Ripple' effect using CSS or a lightweight canvas overlay if possible, otherwise use the water texture image with a slow scale animation.
5. Ensure the music player starts MUTED (browser policy) and requires user interaction to unmute.
6. The 'Messenger' button should open a generic m.me link (e.g., https://m.me/placeholder) - instruct user to update it.
7. DO NOT use standard Shadcn cards. Create custom 'Blob' cards using border-radius.
8. Use the provided image URLs for the floating elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no standard Bootstrap layouts.
Make it feel 'wet' and 'sunny'. High saturation, high brightness.
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast on the bright background. Use dark text (#1A1A1A) on light cards.
Mobile First: Test the scrolling experience on small screens.
